This HTML document implements a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time MQTT networking, procedural terrain generation, and comprehensive upgrade systems. The game supports both desktop and mobile controls, includes a dynamic day/night cycle, heat mechanics, and a robust save system with IndexedDB storage. Players can mine various resources, upgrade their equipment, build structures, and interact with other players in a persistent underground world.
